short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights new post on Hackernews' frontpage since your last visit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you visit Hacker News multiple times a day, this extension will highlight the new posts on frontpage since your last visit as it is very hard to find the new articles as they are always jumbled up and not sorted by the time posted.
